post:
## Available Plan

- **CPU** 1 vCore
- **RAM** 1 GiB
- **Storage** 10 GiB SSD
- **Data Transfer** 1 TiB (both ingress and egress are metered)
- **Bandwidth** 1Gbps
- **IPv4** 1 x /32
- **IPv6** 1 x /64

Order links:

- <del>10 USD / mo</del> [7 USD / mo](https://www.zeptovm.com/clientarea/cart.php?a=add&pid=53&billingcycle=monthly&promocode=6YW20YSE3F)
- <del>100 USD / yr</del> [67 USD / mo](https://www.zeptovm.com/clientarea/cart.php?a=add&pid=53&billingcycle=annual&promocode=1.2911004e%2B50)

Higher plans can be found on our website or requested via ticket but the promotion is only valid for Mini Plan.

## Highlights
- Premium Equinix Datacenter
- Ultra-low latency to major ISP and content providers in East Coast
- Pure NVMe Storage with RAID-1
- BGP Session Available ($15 NRC per ASN and no MRC, can be waived if paid annually)
- Native IPv6 Support, Free /64 (Router Advertisement is implemented and no need to configure it manually now)

## Datacenter & Network
- Datacenter: Equinix DC2
- Uplink: AS3223 Voxility (NTT, Telia, TI Sparkle and Equinix Ashburn)
- Looking Glass: http://us-iad01.lg.misaka.one/
- Test IPv4: `199.119.65.233`
- Test IPv6: `2a0b:4342:1a31:3ec:216:3cff:fe41:2e74`

## About us

**Misaka Network, Inc.** is a registered corporation in Delaware under registration number 6615570.

We run our own network ([AS57695](https://stat.ripe.net/AS57695) / [AS50069](https://stat.ripe.net/AS50069)) and are both ARIN and RIPE members.
